sentence.text: Finally, we demonstrate that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression is elevated in luminal breast cancer cells and luminal breast cancer tissues as compared with other breast cancer subtypes.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Overall, our study proposes that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II acts as a central mRNA splicing, via spliceosome in the control of cell cycle and proliferation during cancer development.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
